TOPIC.HEAD: Some additional information for the Help-tool
TOPIC.TEXT: It reads every 2 seconds the file "topic.dat". If the timestamp changed, the topic in that file is displayed.
It assumes there is a file "help.xml".

There are a few problems with using EV_RICH_TEXT:
No underlined text.
No wrapping of lines.
No possibility of displaying pictures.
No possiblity to change the mouse cursor when going over a link
Suggestion are welcome.
